mapper.insert: insert into SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP (ID, PERSON_OBJECT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, RELATION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personObjectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select ID, PERSON_OBJECT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, RELATION from SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP where SAMPLE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RELATION = 9
select ID, PERSON_OBJECT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, RELATION from SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP where SAMPLE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RELATION != 9
select ID, PERSON_OBJECT_ID, SAMPLE_ID, RELATION from SAMPLE_PERSON_MAP
